remarks: Additive property of second (inner product) argument.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmaplna2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmaplna2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplna2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmaplna2.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
hdmaplna2.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmaplna2.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` R ) $.
hdmaplna2.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplna2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmaplna2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmaplna2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmaplna2.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
hdmaplna2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` ( Y .+ Z ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) .+^ ( ( S ` Z ) ` X ) ) ) $.
